TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

summary.span: 表示 XML Web 服务所使用的可扩展性元素的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of extensibility elements used by the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合可以包含派生自的类的实例，或实例的类。This collection can either contain instances of classes deriving from , or instances of the class. 在派生类中，类允许用户定义除 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 规范中定义的扩展性元素。In a derived class, class allows users to define extensibility elements in addition to those defined in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification. 在中使用它们在如果您事先知道你想要的扩展性元素的类型。Use these in your if you know in advance the type of extensibility element you want to make. 使用时你执行事先不知道元素的格式。Use an when you do not know the format of an element in advance. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CPP/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CS/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/VB/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于许多中的类命名空间公开`Extensions`属性表示，构造函数分配到 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 层次结构中级别相对应的父对象，当前`ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection`嵌套。Since many of the classes in the namespace expose an `Extensions` property representing a , the constructor assigns a parent object corresponding to the level within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) hierarchy where the current `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection` is nested. 有关 WSDL 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CPP/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CS/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/VB/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在集合中的项目数等于集合的容量，容量将是插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组增加一倍。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`参数等于，则`extension`参数添加到末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `extension` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CPP/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CS/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cs#13)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/VB/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.vb#13)]
